page.title: 06Flora
page.content: On 26-6-85 we collected plants from the grass verges on either side of the lane called{Marton Lane}leading from the A170 to Marton village. There had been some cutting back of the grass verges,but the lane did not appear to have been chemically sprayed. This is low lying ground,with nearby springs and deep ditches on either side of the road next to the hedges. The plants collected were:_ Yellow meadow vetchling,{Creeping {buttercup,}herb bennet,{purple {deadnettle,}hoary plantain,{meadow {sweet,}mare's tail,{common maple,} hemlock,{white Dutch clover,}yarrow,{ {wood woundwort,}silverweed, {dandelion cow parsley,{goosegrass,}bush vetch,{ {crosswort,}dogrose,{forget-me-not,}and knapweed. { }
